front.title: An Interoperation Framework for Using RSVP in Mobile IPv6 Networks

abstract.t: This draft proposes a Mobile IPv6 and RSVP interoperation scheme. Inthis scheme, the underlying mobility support mechanism is required toprovide a unique flow identity regardless of node mobility, makingthe node mobility transparent to flow QoS handling mechanisms. ThusQoS signaling delay as well as data packet delays and losses duringhandoff can be reduced.
